content:
Manage claim line items, calculate coverages, process and cancel payments, and gather information about parties on a claim with the help of the claim item service methods.

InsClaimItemService:add - Add a claim line item to a specified claim item object.
InsClaimItemService:calculateCoverages - Calculate the coverage amount and adjusted amount for a claim line item.
InsClaimItemService:cancelPayments - Cancel claim loss and expense payments.
InsClaimItemService:claimCoverageValuation - Verify users' authority to pay or approve amounts in financial activities.
InsClaimItemService:createPayments - Create and save claim payment records based on line item IDs and groupPayments option.
InsClaimItemService:delete - Delete a claim line item from a claim object.
InsClaimItemService:getClaimItems - Retrieve the list of Claimants and their open ClaimCoverages with respective line items (loss or expense).
InsClaimItemService: getClaimLineItemFields - Retrieve the list of fields of a field set for a particular CoverageSpec.
InsClaimItemService:getCoverages - Get coverages that apply to a specific claim.
InsClaimItemService:getInsuranceCodes - Get a list of insurance codes corresponding to coverages associated with claims.
InsClaimItemService:getInvolvedItems - Get a list of involved items and/or people for a specific claim.
InsClaimItemService:getPartyContacts - Get contact information for all involved parties in a specified claim.
InsClaimItemService:getPayees - Return a list of payees for a specified claim.
InsClaimItemService:invokeInitiatePaymentIP - Initiate loss or expense payments.
InsClaimItemService:saveInvolvedItem - Update the total reserve amount of an involved property or injury record.
InsClaimItemService:update - Update a claim line item to a specified claim item object.
title: Insurance Claim Item Service Methods
